commits.author: Dmitriy Lekomtsev
commits.subject: Fix incorrect duration calculation in demo app.
commits.message:
Fix incorrect duration calculation in demo app.

Demo app used Date for convert total seconds to hours, minutes and seconds.
It set Date in UTC format but read in local time zone.
As result localtime zone hours count added to output.

Switched from relying on the `ended` event (which seems unreliable in Safari) to using the native `loop` attribute for FilePlayer and SoundCloud tracks

commit.author: Pete Cook
commit.subject: Fix onDuration being called with null
commit.message:
Fix onDuration being called with null

Some players need onDuration to be called onReady (FilePlayer) and some need it onPlay (YouTube)
Instead of spreading onDuration amongst individual player files, here we just delay onDuration until onPlay if it returns null when onReady fires
Fixes https://github.com/CookPete/react-player/issues/52

commits.message: Add .mov to supported video file types

commits.author: Pete Cook
commits.subject: Add controls prop
commits.message:
Add controls prop

Now that SoundCloud uses filePlayer we can have a generic `controls` prop
The only quirk is that Vimeo controls are not configurable and will always display
Serves as a better solution for https://github.com/CookPete/react-player/pull/59 and https://github.com/CookPete/react-player/issues/11

commits.message:
Limit Travis to node 5

There's no real reason to run the CI suite on so many node versions for a browser based component

commits.message:
Move all tests to Karma

It is a purely browser based component, and so it didn't make sense to split tests between browsers and node
This also moves the karma tests back into Travis, which seems to work for now but could go bad..

commits.message:
Fix Youtube rendering issue with React 15

After upgrading to React 15, `display: none` was not being applied to the Youtube iframe when a different player was required

Add promise and fetch polyfills to build

Previously we were polyfilling using webpack, which of course only affected the demo and not the actual build
Fixes https://github.com/CookPete/react-player/issues/39

commits.author: Pete Cook
commits.subject: Add demo deployment to travis build
commits.message: Add demo deployment to travis build

commits.author: Pete Cook
commits.subject: Tweak YouTube default playerVars
commits.message:
Tweak YouTube default playerVars

playsinline: support playing inline in iOS webviews
rel: disable related videos appearing when video ends
iv_load_policy: disable annotations
origin: extra security measure

commits.author: Pete Cook
commits.subject: Remove unused travis karma setup scripts
commits.message: Remove unused travis karma setup scripts

commits.author: Pete Cook
commits.subject: Remove the need for array.find polyfill
commits.message:
Remove the need for array.find polyfill

2.0.0 was causing errors on older node versions, and it wasn't worth the trouble

commits.author: Pete Cook
commits.subject: Better YouTube error handling
commits.message:
Better YouTube error handling

Fire onError when SDK fails to load
Pass player error codes through to onError

commits.author: Pete Cook
commits.subject: Fix onError tests
commits.message:
Fix onError tests

Vimeo is just a cross-domain iframe, which gives us no error feedback

commit.author: Pete Cook
commit.subject: Vimeo fullscreen support
commit.message:
Vimeo fullscreen support

Enables fullscreen for Vimeo by default to align with YouTube
Fixes https://github.com/CookPete/react-player/issues/33

commits.author: Pete Cook
commits.subject: Change onProgress frequency to 1 second
commits.message:
Change onProgress frequency to 1 second

Half a second caused weirdness when displaying duration due to rounding, plus one second seems cleaner (and of course better for performance)

commits.subject: Add simple Duration component to improve demo
commits.message:
Add simple Duration component to improve demo

commits.message: Destructure state in demo render method

commit.message:
Move onDuration callback from onReady to onPlay

Because YouTube doesn't load metadata until video is played
Fixes https://github.com/CookPete/react-player/issues/31

commits.author: Pete Cook
commits.subject: Ensure YouTube player calls onReady on subsequent loads
commits.message:
Ensure YouTube player calls onReady on subsequent loads

Previously it would only call `onReady` after the initial load
Removes the need to pass `playing` through to `load()`, which is cleaner

commit.subject: Add onDuration prop

Add onDuration prop

Adds a getDuration method to each player, and sends the result of that through onDuration when a player becomes ready
Fixes https://github.com/CookPete/react-player/issues/28

commit.message:
Add semicolons to class properties

Code is uglier but compliant with babel 6.4.x
Removes the need for shrinkwrap and fixes https://github.com/CookPete/react-player/issues/27

commits.message:
Fix FilePlayer width and height

Setting width and height from props made no sense, so use 100% to fill the container element and remain consistent with other players

commits.message: Update travis badge to use master

commits.message:
Fix FilePlayer events

Binding the events directly on mount was firing the onPause/onEnded/etc events from when the component was mounted, and not the current events being passed through

commits.message:

Assume FilePlayer is ready on mount

commits.message:
Ensure volume on subsequent youtube loads

Other players call `onReady` for subsequent loads, which sets the player volume, but the YouTube player doesn't

commits.message:
Move progress logic from players to top level component

* Now we're rendering all players at once, we don't want multiple progress loops going at once
* Renamed `update` to `progress`  makes a bit more sense

commits.author: Pete Cook
commits.subject: Clean up shouldComponentUpdate logic
commits.message:
Clean up shouldComponentUpdate logic

* All players now need to update when url changes

commits.author: Pete Cook
commits.subject: Move defaultProps to separate props file
commits.message: Move defaultProps to separate props file

commits.author: Pete Cook
commits.subject: Set Vimeo iframe src in play method instead of render
commits.message:
Set Vimeo iframe src in play method instead of render

* Allows us to render the Vimeo player without a valid URL, which helps us fix bugs
* More or less reverts commit d308aa62c70d902f95c1184d704f54ee1fcc98d3

commit.author: Pete Cook
commit.subject: Enable multiple YouTube players
commit.message:
Enable multiple YouTube players

Fixes https://github.com/CookPete/react-player/issues/15 and supersedes https://github.com/CookPete/react-player/pull/16

commit.message:

Fixes https://github.com/CookPete/react-player/issues/7

merges.message: Prime players to enable autoplay when out of focus

commits.author: Pete Cook
commits.subject: Use shouldComponentUpdate to prevent unnecessary rendering
commits.message:
Use shouldComponentUpdate to prevent unnecessary rendering

YouTube and Vimeo actually don't ever need re-rendering
SoundCloud only needs to render once it has artwork to display
